desc: Lightsmart is an online lightings store in Singapore that provides high quality and value for money LED lights for both home and business owners. Our LED lights are imported directly from manufacturers and are Singapore Safety Mark certified. Enjoy fuss free shopping online with free shipping on orders above S$200.

layout.text: Bespoke Lighting Solutions For Your Everyday Home
Lighting store in Singapore that brings in well-designed lighting solutions that fit your home interior at an affordable price
